location.scene: its the park where Driver later meets Irenes husband, a thug and a female accomplice (Christina Hendricks) in one of the movies many menacing moments.

location.place: 570 South Rampart Boulevard, Los Angeles, California,
location.scene: Drivers trip to the grocery turns serendipitous when he spots Irene and her son Benicio shopping in the cereal aisle. In the parking lot, her car breaks down, and Driver offers them a ride home. It pays, apparently, to shop local.
